channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Art Fein, Cable TV Host & Author, Dies at 79: ‘The Ed Sullivan of Public Access TV’
item.description: 🎶 Remembering the legendary Art Fein, a true pioneer in music television! 📺💫 #RIPArtFein #MusicLegend

item.title: Outside Lands 2025: Amazon Music Livestream Schedule & Details
item.description: 🚀🎶 Tune in to the future of music at Outside Lands 2025 with Amazon Music's electrifying livestream! 🔥 #VirtualVibes #FutureSounds

item.title: My Chemical Romance covered “Livin’ on a Prayer” at NJ show w/ Death Cab & Thursday (pics, video, setlists)
item.description: 🤘🎶 My Chemical Romance rock Jersey show with epic Bon Jovi cover! Check out the pics and setlists! #MCR #RockOn 🎸🔥

item.title: Watch Toyah & Robert Fripp revisit Neil Young’s “Rockin’ in the Free World”
item.description: Rock out with Toyah & Robert Fripp as they give a fresh spin to Neil Young's classic 🎸🔥 #musicnews #RockinInTheFreeWorld

item.title: Snail Mail Debut Two More New Songs At Seattle Tour Closer
item.description: Seattle got an extra dose of 🐌💌 vibes as Snail Mail dropped two fresh tracks at their tour finale! 🎶✨ #NewMusicAlert #SnailMail
